name: SIMPLE SUPERHERO CHARACTERS
description:
Tatatachan! This pack contains 3 superheros willing to fight and save their people (Diablo, Magma Girl and Super Young). You can use them in different games and platforms.

Protagonists (16 Animations):

– Idle

– Jump

– Fall

– Walk

– Run

– Push

– Pull

– Dash

– Defeat

– Hurt

– Confused

– Grip on the wall

– Punch

– Jump hit

– Pick Up

- Special Movement

If you need something, contact me: azucena.na90@gmail.com

Do you want to help me keep working and get exclusive rebates on my assets? Go through my PATREON, any help is welcome.

TERMS OF USE:

The purchase of this product is for PERSONAL AND COMERCIAL USE.
